The Zoucheng Taiping Coal Mine is a shaft coal mine located in Taiping Town, Zoucheng City, Shandong Province, China

operators: Shandong Lutai Coal Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: Shandong Lutai Coal Industry Co Ltd operates the mine, which is owned by China Xinda Asset Management.
